parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the motorcycle to lose directional control and stability, leading to accidents and endangering the life of the rider and other motorists.
symptoms: The transmission jumps in and out of 2nd gear
causing the motorcycle to lose directional control and stability
and potentially entering oncoming traffic or the unpaved run-off area of the roadway.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cush-drive hub can cause the rear wheel to lock, leading to accidents and potentially endangering the life of the rider.
symptoms: The cush-drive hub cracks or breaks
potentially causing the rear wheel to lock
and leading to a loss of control and stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch can cause the engine components to lock up, leading to accidents and potentially endangering the life of the rider.
symptoms: causing the engine components to lock up
and potentially leading to a loss of control and stability.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The thin and weak material of the gas tank can cause it to crack, leading to fuel leaks, gas odors, and potentially a fire hazard while driving.
symptoms: Gas odor inside or outside the vehicle
fuel expelled from the vehicle while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The coolant hose clip under the tank may not be tightened enough from the factory, which can cause the hose to detach, leading to hot coolant spillage, potentially causing severe burns or injuries to the rider.
symptoms: Hot coolant suddenly leaking onto the rider
coolant hose detached from the engine
